description:
Experience the story that leads to the main plot of DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT and the 23rd World Tournament, where many upheavals took place! This additional scenario allows you to enjoy DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT even more.

Three years have passed since the battle with King Piccolo plunged the world into terror. Goku, who has grown into a young man, is confronted by Ma Junior, the reincarnation of King Piccolo. Ma Junior had entered the Tenkaichi Budokai (World Tournament) to take revenge on Goku, who had destroyed him in the past. The fight for the fate of the world and the title of Tenkaichi (top of the world tournament) begins now!

The DLC includes:
- New Story Arc
- New Super Attacks
- New Soul Emblems
- Others

*The content can be played without clearing the Main Story.
*This product is also included in Season Pass 2. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
name: DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT + A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET - 23rd World Tournament
